definitions.text: the conscious subjective aspect of feeling or emotion

examples: Will the new rules affect me?

definitions.text: act physically on; have an effect upon
examples: the medicine affects my heart rate
This new ruling affects your business

definitions.text: make believe with the intent to deceive
examples: He feigned that he was ill

definitions.text: have an emotional or cognitive impact upon
examples: This child impressed me as unusually mature
This behavior struck me as odd
